StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetNROTCCandidate]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int AS
DECLARE @LSIHistoryPresent bit DECLARE @PriorServiceHistoryPresent bit
--- RETRIEVE THE LSI HISTORY PRESENT FLAG IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LSI_HISTORY LSIH INNER JOIN NWA N ON LSIH.PERSON_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID WHERE LSIH.PERSON_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND @NWAID = N.NWA_ID) SET @LSIHistoryPresent = 1 ELSE SET @LSIHistoryPresent = 0
--- RETRIEVE THE PRIOR SERVICE HISTORY PRESENT FLAG SET @PriorServiceHistoryPresent = CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_PRIOR_SERVICE PSH INNER JOIN NWA N ON PSH.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID WHERE PSH.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND N.NWA_ID = @NWAID) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT N.NWA_ID, COALESCE(NC.NROTC_CANDIDATE_ID, 0) AS NROTC_CANDIDATE_ID, CONVERT(CHAR(11), N.NWA_DECLARED_DATE, 106) AS SELECTION_BOARD_DATE, COALESCE(N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS NROTC_PROGRAM, COALESCE(N.SHIP_MISSION, 0) AS PROJECTED_COMMISSION_FY, COALESCE(MC.RACE_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS RACE_CODE, COALESCE(MC.ETHNIC_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS ETHNIC_CODE, COALESCE(MC.MARITAL_STATUS_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS MARITAL_STATUS_CODE, COALESCE(MC.RELIGION_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS RELIGION_CODE, COALESCE(MC.MEPCOM_RACE_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS MEPCOM_RACE_CATEGORY_CODE, COALESCE(MC.MEPCOM_ETHNIC_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS MEPCOM_ETHNIC_CATEGORY_CODE, COALESCE(MC.COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN, SPACE(0)) AS COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN, COALESCE(MC.CITIZENSHIP, SPACE(0)) AS CITIZENSHIP, COALESCE(N.EMAIL_ADDRESS, SPACE(0)) AS EMAIL_ADDRESS, COALESCE(N.NWA_LOG_NOTES, SPACE(0)) AS WAIVER_NOTES, COALESCE(NC.COLLEGE_ACCEPTANCE_LETTER, SPACE(0)) AS COLLEGE_ACCEPTANCE_LETTER, COALESCE(NC.MEDICAL_DISPOSITION, 0) AS MEDICAL_DISPOSITION, COALESCE(NC.CONSULTATION_TYPE, SPACE(0)) AS CONSULTATION_TYPE, @LSIHistoryPresent AS LSI_HISTORY_PRESENT, @PriorServiceHistoryPresent AS PRIOR_SERVICE_HISTORY_PRESENT FROM NWA N INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON (N.NWA_ID = @NWAID AND N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN NROTC_CANDIDATE NC ON N.NWA_ID = NC.NWA_ID
